title: BBC To Return BAFTA After Inquiry Savages Fakery Used To Secure Princess Diana Interview
content:
1. BBC To Return BAFTA After Inquiry Savages Fakery Used To Secure Princess Diana Interview  Deadline
  2. Martin Bashir Used 'Deceit' to Secure His 1995 Princess Diana Interview, BBC Report Says  Yahoo Entertainment
  3. BBC apologizes after report finds it used deceitful methods to secure Diana interview  CNN
  4. Martin Bashir: Inquiry criticises BBC over 'deceitful' Diana interview  BBC News
  5. ABC Should Open Michael Jackson Interview Investigation as BBC Finds Martin Bashir “Deceived” Princess Diana's Brother to Get Famous Interview  Showbiz411
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: BBC、ダイアナ妃インタビューの捏造を指摘されBAFTAを返還へ
英国广播公司（BBC）对戴安娜王妃的采访作假进行调查后，将退回BAFTA。
英國廣播公司（BBC）對戴安娜王妃的採訪作假進行調查後，將退回BAFTA。
